Title: Mahmood Yakubu steps down as INEC chairman
Summary: Mahmood Yakubu has formally concluded his tenure as Chairman of the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) His second and final five-year term is set to expire in November 2025 . Agbamuche-Mbu Appointed Acting Head of the Commission .

Title: UNIBEN bans students’ sign-out celebration
Summary: The ban is contained in a circular by the university’s Registrar, Mr Ademola Bobola, on Tuesday in Benin . In the circular addressed to members of the University of Benin, Mr Bobola wrote .

Title: APC defends demolitions in Lagos
Summary: Lagos State chapter of the All Progressives Congress (APC) says no responsible government can look away while illegal structures endanger lives, obstruct development, and compromise public safety .

Title: Pope Leo to make first papal trip to Turkey, Lebanon
Summary: Pope Leo XIV will travel to Turkey and Lebanon in a six-day trip beginning late November . The 70-year-old American is expected in Turkey from November 27-30 . The trip is his first since becoming head of the Catholic Church .

Title: Tinubu seeks $2.3b external loan for budget deficit, debt refinancing
Summary: President Bola Ahmed Tinubu has written to the House of Representatives seeking approval to raise a total of $2.347 billion in the international capital market . The request includes a $1.23 billion new loan to help fund the 2025 budget deficit .

Title: NNPCL has responded to queries on unaccounted N210trn – Senate
Summary: NNPCL has responded to queries on unaccounted N210trn – Senate . Chairman of Senate Committee on Public Accounts, Senator Aliyu Wadada, explained that the responses were yet to be critically looked into .

Title: 2026 WCQ: Osimhen, Lookman, 17 others arrive Super Eagles camp in South Africa
Summary: 17 Super Eagles players have arrived at the team’s camp in Polokwane, South Africa, as Nigeria steps up preparations for a crucial FIFA World Cup qualifying clash against Lesotho .

Title: HURIWA urges fairness, probe in Enugu land dispute
Summary: The Human Rights Writers Association of Nigeria (HURIWA) urges fairness, transparency, and respect for human rights in ongoing investigation of a land dispute in Enugu State .

Title: Tinubu asks Senate to confirm commissioners for FCCPC, NPC, RMAFC, NERC
Summary: Tinubu asks Senate to confirm commissioners for FCCPC, NPC, RMAFC, NERC . The letter dated 31st July, 2025, was read by the President of the Senate, Senator Godswill Akpabio .

Title: Anambra tricycle operators decry extortion, threats by revenue collectors
Summary: Anambra tricycle operators decry extortion, threats by revenue collectors and park operators . Tricycle operators in Onitsha and its environs decry what they described as 'high-level extortion' and intimidation .
